title: Naked eye detection of Arsenite, Arsenate, and H2S using a single paper strip, based on deprotonation mechanism by a Schiff base naphthaldehyde conjugate

Considering the significant toxicity of arsenite (AsO2-), arsenate (AsO43-), and hydrogen sulphide (H2S), the early detection of these ions and gas using simple methods like naked-eye chemosensors could have substantial...
